ModMetaData.name: Ammunition
ModMetaData.author: LimeTreeSnake
ModMetaData.description:
-License- You may use this code as however you want. However, do notify me as I'd love to hear if people find use of my code! :)
-Associated Ammunition by DamageDefOf- Notice, anything within () is searched words within damage def to try to associate custom damage made by mods I've decided to omit the first capital letter
Primitive Ammunition: Arrow, Blunt, Crush, Cut, Scratch, Stab, (arrow), (bolas), (rangedStab), (axe), Industrial Ammunition: Billet, (bullet) Chemical Ammunition: Flame, Burn, (blaze), (fire) Nitrogen Ammunition: Frostbite, (cold) Battery Ammunition: Stun, EMP, (electr), (plasma), (laser), (charge), (energy)
Should you wish for me to add a damage type definiton for compatibility, message me.
